name: The Fire Ruby
description:
The Fire Ruby is a text adventure in which the player searches for the eponymous legendary jewel, overcoming traps and pitfalls along the way.

This game was developed using the Quill Adventure System. It supports the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West as well as more advanced commands such as LIND and LUND for LOOK BEHIND and LOOK UNDER. When completed correctly the player's score will be 100%.
